bibl.title: Posidippus Old and New.
Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309)
bibl.author: SIDER, David

bibl.note: The differences between the old Posidippus ("pre-milanese") and the new Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309).
SIDER David, Posidippus Old and New.

Benjamin ACOSTA-HUGHES, Elizabeth KOSMETATOU and Manuel BAUMBACH (Edd.), Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309) = Hellenic Studies. 2 (Washington, D.C. - Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2004) pp. 29-41.
